sen.j: 西洋料理（せいようりょうり）とは、西洋の料理。
sen.e: Western dishes are the dishes peculiar to the Western countries.
Western dishes are the dishes peculiar to the Western countries.
Western dishes are the dishes peculiar to the Western countries.

sen.j: 日本料理や中華料理をはじめとした東洋の料理に対置させられるカテゴリーである。
sen.e: The category is in contrast with Orient dishes such as Japanese dishes and Chinese dishes.
The category is in contrast with Oriental dishes such as Japanese dishes and Chinese dishes.
The category is in contrast with Oriental dishes such as Japanese dishes and Chinese dishes.

sen.j: 特に西洋料理と呼ぶ場合は、日本では明治から昭和にかけてフランス料理の紹介が先行した事情から、年輩者を中心にフランス料理のフルコースの料理がイメージされる場合が多い。
sen.e: For elderly people, the term Western dishes conjures up an image of French full-course dinner, because French cuisine was introduced ro Japan between the Meiji period and the Showa period.
For elderly people, the term Western dishes conjures up an image of French full-course dinner, because French cuisine was introduced to Japan between the Meiji period and the Showa period.
For elderly people, the term Western dishes conjures up an image of French full-course dinner, because French cuisine was introduced to Japan between the Meiji period and the Showa period.

sen.j: そして西洋料理の多くはヨーロッパに存在する国から伝わった料理のことをひとまとめに総称することが多い。
sen.e: In many cases, the term Western dishes is collectively used to refer to the cooking style brought from the European countries.
In many cases, the term Western dishes is collectively used to refer to the cooking style brought from the European countries.
In many cases, the term Western dishes is collectively used to refer to the cooking style brought from the European countries.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。

sen.j: 時々だがアメリカ料理も含まれることがある。
sen.e: However, it sometimes includes American dishes.
However, it sometimes includes American dishes.
However, it sometimes includes American dishes.

sen.j: ギリシア料理やカフカースの料理など、アジアとヨーロッパの境界に位置する国の料理は、隣接する地域の東洋料理（トルコ料理など）との区別が困難である。
sen.e: Dishes of those countries located on the borders of Asia and Europe such as Greek dishes and Caucasian dishes are hard to distinguish from Orient dishes of the neighboring areas- Turkish dishes, for example.

Dishes of those countries located on the borders of Asia and Europe such as Greek dishes and Caucasian dishes are hard to distinguish from Oriental dishes of the neighboring areas- Turkish dishes, for example.

Dishes of those countries located on the borders of Asia and Europe such as Greek dishes and Caucasian dishes are hard to distinguish from Oriental dishes of the neighboring areas - Turkish dishes, for example.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。

sen.j: またインドからイギリスを経由して伝わったカレーライスなどは代表的な洋食の一つに位置付けられているが、西洋料理とは言い難い。
sen.e: Curry and rice introduced from India via the UK is supposed to be a typical Western dish, but it is difficult to define so.
Curry and rice introduced from India via the UK is supposed to be a typical Western dish, but it is difficult to define so.
Curry and rice introduced from India via the UK is supposed to be a typical Western dish, but it is difficult to define so.

sen.j: なお、軽食であるハンバーガーを指して西洋料理と言うことはあまりない。
sen.e: Hamburgers which are light foods are not included in the Western dishes.
Hamburgers which are light foods are not included in the Western dishes.
Hamburgers which are light foods are not included in the Western dishes.

tit.j: 主に日本で認識されている西洋料理
tit.e: The Western dishes recognized in Japan
The Western dishes recognized in Japan
The Western dishes recognized in Japan
